Question 15 
Electrical Machine (DC machine)
The following columns present various modes of induction machine operation and the ranges of slip :
A 
     B
Mode of operation 
Range of slip
(a)  Running in generator mode 
(p)  From 0.0 to 1.0
(b)  Running in motor mode 
(q)  From 1.0 to 2.0
(c)  Plugging in motor mode 
(r)  From 
1.0

 to 0.0
The correct matching between the elements in column A with those of column B is
(A) a-r, b-p and c-q 
(B) a-r, b-q and c-p
(C) a-p, b-r and c-q 
(D) a-q, b-p and c-r
